snippet.title: ANTE MORTEM | Trailer
snippet.description:
Website : https://antemortem.cc
Steam Page : https://store.steampowered.com/app/1987900/Ante_Mortem/?beta=0
itch.io : https://coffeeinteractive.itch.io/ante-mortem
Gamejolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/antemortem/717144

Ante Mortem is an exploration game with a touch of puzzles in order to solve a mystery, that of this scary and mysterious island in a vintage and pixelated style reminiscent of PS1 games!
Horror is part of it WITHOUT ANY JUMPSCARE simply with the heavy and chilling atmosphere of abandonment, melancholy and "things" that live on this island.

What would be your first and last wish if you died tomorrow?
Explore this mysterious and frightening island.
Solve its puzzles.
And discover the truth before sinking into the purest madness that can exist...
That of knowing your death.

Discord : https://discord.gg/Bab2e3X9mK
Twitter : https://twitter.com/AUGEREAU14
